Dear Ferrari,
I would like to report a bug found on the webiste of the GTC4LussoT.
(I am using this communication mode because I could not find any relevant address email on the website)

The bug that I would like to report is on the sound extract:
If you listen carefully to this extract, you will hear 3 phases: the engine start (obviously, the Ferrari GTC4 Lusso T), but after 1 second, you are hearing something totally different, and then in the end again the Ferrari GTC4 Lusso T.
The sound in the middle is not a Ferrari sound, and for the below reasons:
1. This sound is the flat6 of a Porsche 911 (997) GT3 RS 4.0, atmospheric engine, completely different from a V8 turbo
2. The gear changing is manual, which is obviously not possible on the Ferrari.

My conclusion is that you have most probably been hacked by someone who wanted to make fun of you but sticking a Porsche noise in the extract, and I am sorry for that. 

http://gtc4lussot.ferrari.com/it/sport/engine-sound
And with a V12 opposed to the V8 of the T

Abbiamo fatto un podio nelle ultime otto gare (solo perché era Monza e la Red Bull non andava avanti). Hai la possibilità di fare un terzo sicuro e giocarti la seconda posizione con Verstappen copiando semplicemente la strategia dell'olandese (non solo sua, ma di tutti top driver, Kimi compreso). Invece no: ritardare il pitstop, farsi prendere da Hamilton, perdere tutto su Verstappen e poi montare le soft quando erano le hard le gomme più performanti. La mia è solo una opinione e voi avete ingegneri e cervelloni: ma oggi si doveva fare la strategia più normale per ottenere di più

20.post_text: “The secret is to stay humble. I always remember that I was born on the outskirts.” #EnzoFerrari

comments.message: yes never forget where you come from

Yeah, stay "humble" and then be rude to Tractor maker Feruccio Lamborghini and create unnecessary competition that could have been avoided if he had calmly handled the situation.

Just think about it, if there was no Lamborghini today, most of its customers would have bought Ferrari cars and their sales would have been much higher than what they are now.

Sou fã da Ferrari,e tenho um sonho de formar um projeto social na minha cidade que é formar uma escolinha de futebol chamada f.c. Ferrari,pois existem muitas crianças em condições de risco no município,é também uma maneira de ajudar e criar cidadãos d bem.
Humble, but rich and vain enough to spend several hundred thousand dollars on a car that is really just there for you to show off... :P

If the secret was to "stay humble," no one would buy a Ferrari. 
As awesome and beautiful as they are, they are still a luxury purchase
My respects for this great Man, his legaccy Is enormeus all around The world and thanks for send thiese publications. I love Ferrari design.

21.post_text: #458Speciale: for people that want to live life to the fullest

comments.message: Ferrari got to come out with a compact car under 50th 's the'd make a killing
The last of the mid engine V8 Ferraris with a proper engine. No turbo nonsense here!

Mit dem bärenstarken Ferrari 458 Speciale holt der Sportwagenbauer auf der IAA 2013 den Sommer zurück. Auch der Preis für das Sondermodell steht fest

Er hat den V8 mit der stärksten Literleistung aller Saugmotoren und ist das teuerste Modell in der Baureihe: Wenn Ferrari demnächst mit der Auslieferung des 458 Speciale beginnt, müssen die Kunden dafür rund 240.000 Euro bezahlen. Das kündigte der italienische Hersteller bei der Weltpremiere der Sportversion auf der Internationalen Automobil-Ausstellung (IAA) in Frankfurt an.

Ferrari 458 Speciale: Sondermodell mit 605 PS

Zu diesem Preis gibt es das Coupé mit schnelleren Regelsystemen, einem überarbeiteten Fahrwerk und einem schnittigeren Design mit beweglichen Spoilern. Die Leistung des 4,5 Liter großen V8-Motors wird gegenüber dem 458 um rund fünf Prozent auf 605 PS angehoben.

Mit maximal 540 Newtonmetern (Nm) Drehmoment beschleunigt der stärkste V8-Saugmotor in der Firmengeschichte den zweisitzigen Ferrari 458 Speciale in 3,0 Sekunden auf Tempo 100 und ermöglicht eine Spitzengeschwindigkeit von über 320 km/h. Den Verbrauch im Normzyklus gibt Ferrari mit 11,6 Litern und den CO2-Ausstoß mit 275 g/km an.
Autor: dpa/az

comments.message:
Prettier than a 360, yes. Prettier than a 360 spider, yes.
But nor as pretty as a 360 CS. That lowered muscular stance, those rims, and the black tail grille, not forgetting the scuderia stripe. Almost as pretty as an F50
I have the Barbie one. That's as close as I will ever get!
When the 355 GTS appeared in Goldeneye, thats when I fell in love with this car.
Gold Flaked white pearl not "pearl white" best model's ever anywhere from the 90's-2000's hands down.🚘🤔💵🏁
The last beautiful V8 Ferrari. Don't get me wrong, the 360 was nice and the F430 looked good. But the California and 488 are not. And sorry 458 fanboys, that car is hideous.
One of my all time favourite cars. Prefer hard top though.
Love this model, biggest problem: sticky dashboard and panels. That v8 sounds amazing!!
Best part is that you don't have to shell out a fortune to get one in good condition these days- assuming that you've saved up prudently for many years 😎
The last gorgeous Ferrari!! After the 355 ( and I'm sorry to say but it's true) the 360 looks like an angry kitchen appliance.... 430 didn't look much better. As far as the new ones, 488 looks okay.

A fabulous car. I just wish you would do the right thing and replace the sticky gooey plastics on this car as well as other models of Ferraris. I do not want to put after market reconditioned parts on my all original Fiorano Spider.
